content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5) containing 67 coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) moving items from drill to chest

### Iron Production Line 1 at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5) containing 28 iron plates and 7 copper plates

### Iron Production Line 2 at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5) containing 133 iron plates

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam distribution
- Electricity network powering multiple entities

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 (8.5, 13.5) set to produce automation science packs
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and transport belts for material movement
- Connected to a lab for research

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in storage before attempting extraction
- Use inspect_inventory() to check container contents before extraction
- Handle cases where required items are missing gracefully

### Errors with assembling machine production
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Check recipe requirements and maintain adequate supply of materials
- Current issue: Cannot create automation science pack due to missing copper plates

### Resource management issues
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure proper connection of transport systems between production stages
- Keep track of storage chest contents and production bottlenecks

### Entity placement and connection issues
- Multiple disconnected pipe groups indicate potential fluid transport issues
- Ensure proper connectivity between power poles for consistent electricity distribution
- Verify belt groups are properly connected for efficient item transport
